ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from creating Price Actions related to Pricing Guidance if the evaluation event is not After Calculate.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__TargetObject__c, 'Quote Line Pricing Guidance') && (INCLUDES(SBQQ__Rule__r.SBQQ__EvaluationEvent__c, 'On Initialization') || INCLUDES(SBQQ__Rule__r.SBQQ__EvaluationEvent__c, 'Before Calculate') || INCLUDES(SBQQ__Rule__r.SBQQ__EvaluationEvent__c, 'On Calculate'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To use Quote Line Pricing Guidance as the Target Object, select After Calculate from the Calculator Evaluation Event dropdown list.
